org.restlet.ext.swagger

Class SwaggerComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • org.restlet.Component
        • org.restlet.ext.swagger.SwaggerComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Uniform

    public class SwaggerComponent
extends Component
    Component that can configure itself given a Swagger document. First, it creates the server connectors and the virtual hosts if needed, trying to reuse existing ones if available. Then it creates a SwaggerApplication using this SwaggerApplication.SwaggerApplication(Representation) constructor.

    Concurrency note: instances of this class or its subclasses can be invoked by several threads at the same time and therefore must be thread-safe. You should be especially careful when storing state in member variables.
    Author:
    Jerome Louvel

      Constructor and Description
      SwaggerComponent()
      Default constructor.
      SwaggerComponent(Reference swaggerRef)
      Constructor loading a Swagger description document at a given URI.

      The necessary client connectors are automatically created.
      SwaggerComponent(Representation swagger)
      Constructor based on a given Swagger description document.
      SwaggerComponent(String swaggerUri)
      Constructor loading a Swagger description document at a given URI.

      The necessary client connectors are automatically created.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SwaggerApplication attach(Reference swaggerRef)
      Attaches an application created from a Swagger description document available at a given URI reference.
      SwaggerApplication attach(Representation swagger)
      Attaches an application created from a Swagger description document to the component.
      SwaggerApplication attach(String swaggerUri)
      Attaches an application created from a Swagger description document available at a given URI.
      static void main(String[] args)
      Main method capable of configuring and starting a whole Restlet Component based on a list of local Swagger documents URIs, for example "file:///C:/YahooSearch.swagger".

      The necessary client connectors are automatically created.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Main method capable of configuring and starting a whole Restlet Component based on a list of local Swagger documents URIs, for example "file:///C:/YahooSearch.swagger".

        The necessary client connectors are automatically created.
        Parameters:
        args - List of local Swagger document URIs.
        Throws:
        Exception
